title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained LLM runner with a REST/CLI API that lets you pull, run and chat with 100+ open-source models (Llama-3, Phi-3, Gemma, Mistral, etc.) on macOS, Linux and Windows.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list, delete models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same features as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-community/llms/ollama
summary: LangChain integration that exposes Ollama as a standard LLM and chat model with memory, tools, RAG, agents, etc.

title: ollama-webui/ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama-WebUI) that clones ChatGPT look-and-feel; chat, multi-user, model manager, RAG uploads, voice.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, list, delete models with fluent builder API.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for Ollama; chat, generate, embeddings, model ops.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rich interactive CLI for Ollama with chat history, prompt templates, markdown rendering, and context management.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into an inline coding copilot with autocomplete and chat sidebar.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector, PVC, and ingress.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official multi-arch Docker images (CPU & CUDA) for Ollama server.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator for building RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain to chat with local PDFs.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams Ollama chat replies into any channel with slash commands and thread support.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings Ollama models into channels/DM with streaming and thread replies.

title: ollama-n8n
summary: n8n community node to call Ollama chat or generate endpoints inside no-code workflows.

title: ollama-mistral-7b-rag
summary: Example repo fine-tuning Mistral-7B with LoRA on private data then serving with Ollama.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Official registry of 100+ GGUF models (Llama-3, CodeLlama, Phi-3, Gemma, Mistral, etc.) with Modelfile definitions.

title: ollama-reddit
summary: Active subreddit for Ollama news, model requests, troubleshooting and showcase.

title: ollama-hackernews
summary: Hacker News launch thread discussing Ollama v0.1.30 with Windows support and OpenAI-compat endpoints.
